Verses: 1 annaatkalil Esekkiyaa Vyaadhippattu Maranaththukku Edhuvaayirundhaan; Appozhudhu Aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Ennum Theerkkadharisi Avanidaththil Vandhu, Avanai Nokki: Neer Umadhu Veettukkaariyaththai Ozhunguppaduththum; Neer Pizhaikkamaatteer, Mariththuppoveer Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
2 appozhudhu Esekkiyaa Than Mugaththai Suvarppuramaagath Thirumbik Kondu, Karththarai Nokki:
3 aa Karththaave, Naan Umakku Munbaaga Unmaiyum Mana Uththamamumaai Nadandhu, Umadhu Paarvaikku Nalamaanadhai Seydhen Enbadhai Ninaiththarulum Endru Vinnappampanninaan. Esekkiyaa Migavum Azhudhaan.
4 esaayaa Paadhi Mutraththaivittu Appuram Pogiradharkumunne, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Avanukku Undaagi, Avar Sonnadhu:

5 nee Thirumbippoi, En Janaththin Adhipadhiyaagiya Esekkiyaavai Nokki: Un Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Dhevanaayirukkira Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Un Vinnappaththaik Ketten, Un Kanneeraik Kanden; Idho, Naan Unnai Gunamaakkuven; Moondraam Naalile Nee Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkup Povaai.

6 un Naatkalode Padhinaindhu Varushangalaik Koottuven; Unnaiyum Indha Nagaraththaiyum Aseeriyaa Raajaavin Kaikkuth Thappuviththu, En Nimiththamum En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Nimiththamum Indha Nagaraththukku Aadharavaai Iruppen Endru Sol Endraar.
7 pinbu Esaayaa: Aththippazhaththu Adaiyaik Konduvaarungal Endraan; Adhai Avargal Konduvandhu, Pilavaiyinmel Patruppottapodhu Avan Pizhaiththaan.
8 esekkiyaa Esaayaavai Nokki: Karththar Ennaik Gunamaakkuvadharkum, Moondraamnaalile Naan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkup Povadharkum Adaiyaalam Enna Endraan.

9 adharku Esaayaa: Karththar Thaam Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye Seyvaarenbadharku, Karththaraal Unakku Undaagum Adaiyaalamaaga Saayai Paththup Paagai Munnittup Pogavendumo, Paththuppaagai Pinnittuth Thirumba Vendumo Endru Kettaan.
10 adharku Esekkiyaa: Saayai Paththuppaagai Munnittuppogiradhu Lesaana Kaariyam; Appadi Vendaam; Saayai Paththuppaagai Pinnittuth Thirumbavendum Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Esaayaa Theerkkadharisi Karththarai Nokkik Kooppidugaiyil, Avar Aagaasudaiya Sooriya Kadiyaaraththil Paagaikkup Paagai Munpona Saayai Paththuppaagai Pinnittuth Thirumbumpadi Seydhaar.
12 akkaalaththile Balaadhaanin Kumaaranaagiya Perodhaak Balaadhaan Ennum Baabilonin Raajaa Esekkiyaa Vyaadhippattirukkiradhaik Kettu, Avanidaththukku Nirubangalaiyum Vegumaanaththaiyum Anuppinaan.

13 esekkiyaa Avargalai Angigariththu, Pinbu Avargalukkuth Than Pokkishasaalai Anaiththaiyum, Velliyaiyum, Ponnaiyum, Kandhavarkkangalaiyum, Nalla Parimalathailaththaiyum, Than Aayudhasaalai Anaiththaiyum Than Pokkishasaalaigalilulla Ellaavatraiyum Kaanbiththaan; Than Aramanaiyilum Than Raajyaththil Engum Esekkiyaa Avargalukkuk Kaanbiyaadha Porul Ondrum Illai.

14 appozhudhu Esaayaa Theerkkadharisi Esekkiyaa Raajaavinidaththil Vandhu: Andha Manushar Enna Sonnaargal, Engeyirundhu Ummidaththil Vandhaargal Endru Kettaan. Adharku Esekkiyaa: Baabilon Ennum Dhooradhesaththilirundhu Vandhaargal Endraan.

15 appozhudhu Avan: Ummudaiya Veettil Ennaththaip Paarththaargal Endru Kettaan. Adharku Esekkiyaa: En Veettilulla Ellaavatraiyum Paarththaargal; En Pokkishangalil Naan Avargalukkuk Kaanbiyaadha Porul Ondrum Illai Endraan.
16 appozhudhu Esaayaa Esekkiyaavai Nokki: Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelum.
17 idho, Naatkal Varum; Appozhudhu Umadhu Veettil Ulladhilum, Umadhu Pidhaakkal Innaalvaraikkum Serththadhilum Ondrum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkappadaamal Ellaam Baabilonukkuk Kondupogappadum.
18 neer Perappogira Umadhu Sandhaanamaagiya Umadhu Kumaarargalilum Silar Baabilon Raajaavin Aramanaiyile Aramanai Velaikkaararaayiruppaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
19 appozhudhu Esekkiyaa Esaayaavai Nokki: Neer Sonna Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Nalladhudhaan Endru Solli, En Naatkalilaavadhu Samaadhaanamum Unmaiyum Irukkume Endraan.

20 esekkiyaavin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avanudaiya Ellaa Vallamaiyum, Avan Oru Kulaththaiyum Saalagaththaiyum Undaakkinadhinaale Thanneerai Nagaraththirkulle Varappanninadhum, Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
21 esekkiyaa Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Manaase Avan Sthaanaththil RaajaavaanaanÂ .
